text: emi? Tana duskaryalu tanaku akarsaniyanga kanabadetatlu ceyabadi nanduku, evadaite vatini manci karyaluga bhavistado! (Atadu sanmarganlo unna vadito samanudu kagalada)? Niscayanga allah tanu korina vanini margabhrastatvanlo vadalutadu mariyu tanu korina vaniki margadarsakatvam cestadu. Kavuna nivu vari koraku cintinci ninnu nivu duhkhaniki guri cesukoku. Niscayanga, vari karmalanni allah ku baga telusu
